  1. mockit.asm.classes

Uses of Package
mockit.asm.classes

Packages that use mockit.asm.classes
Package
Description
mockit.asm.classes
 
mockit.asm.fields
 
mockit.asm.methods
 
mockit.internal
Contains the classes that implement the internal mechanisms of the toolkit, and as such are not intended for direct use in client code.
mockit.internal.capturing
 
mockit.internal.classGeneration
 
mockit.internal.expectations.mocking
 
mockit.internal.faking
 
  • Classes in mockit.asm.classes used by mockit.asm.classes
    Class
    Description
    ClassInfo
    Holds additional information about a classfile: ClassInfo.signature, ClassInfo.superName, ClassInfo.interfaces, ClassInfo.hostClassName.
    ClassReader
    A Java class parser to make a ClassVisitor visit an existing class.
    ClassVisitor
    A visitor to visit a Java class, in the following order:
    visit (visitAnnotation)* (visitInnerClass | visitField | visitMethod)* visitEnd.
    ClassWriter
    A ClassVisitor that generates classes in bytecode form, that is, a byte array conforming to the Java class file format.
  • Classes in mockit.asm.classes used by mockit.asm.fields

  • Classes in mockit.asm.classes used by mockit.internal
    Class
    Description
    ClassInfo
    Holds additional information about a classfile: ClassInfo.signature, ClassInfo.superName, ClassInfo.interfaces, ClassInfo.hostClassName.
    ClassReader
    A Java class parser to make a ClassVisitor visit an existing class.
    ClassVisitor
    A visitor to visit a Java class, in the following order:
    visit (visitAnnotation)* (visitInnerClass | visitField | visitMethod)* visitEnd.
    WrappingClassVisitor
    Same as ClassVisitor, except it always wraps a ClassWriter.
